author: Ja'han Jones
title: In Trump’s honor, Arizona Republicans approve conspiracy-based election bills

sentence: Fifteen Republican legislators have signed on to Fillmore's bill, including Rep. Mark Finchem, the Trump-endorsed candidate for Arizona secretary of state.
author: Chris Cillizza
title: An Arizona Republican just unveiled the most brazen election bill yet

sentence: On Monday, Arizona state Rep. Mark Finchem (Trump’s endorsed candidate for secretary of state) introduced a resolution seeking to decertify the results in Maricopa, Pima and Yuma counties — more than a year after the presidential election and following numerous fruitless attempts at digging up evidence that a massive voter fraud scheme cost Trump the presidency.
author: Liz Skalka
title: Arizona Republican Says His Daughter Got Text Calling Him 'N-Word' RINO

sentence: Arizona Republican State Representative Mark Finchem (District 11) is not a widely-known figure outside of the Grand Cayon State’s most intimate political cliques.
author: Brandon Gage
title: Donald Trump loyalist running for Arizona secretary of state is a right-wing plot to end democracy

sentence: "In a Feb. 11 call, Boris Epshteyn, a lawyer and former special assistant to Trump, pointed again to baseless claims of widespread election fraud as he tried without success to rally support for a vote on a bill by state Republican Rep. Mark Finchem to set aside the results in three Arizona counties, Bowers told The Arizona Republic’s political podcast The Gaggle during a wide-ranging interview this week," the newspaper reported.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Trump ally pressed Arizona Republican to pass bill to erase 2020 election results: report

sentence: Republican state Rep. Mark Finchem, who has promoted a host of QAnon conspiracies and introduced a resolution to decertify the 2020 presidential election in Arizona, attended the same protest.
title: The Arizona Republican Caught in a Vise by Trump’s Big Lie

sentence: The suit, brought by a voting rights group, also named state Rep. Mark Finchem.

title: Judge Tosses out Lawsuit Aimed at Keeping Reps. Gosar, Biggs off Ballots
